entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
